qUETZALCOATL:

"I think that you're wrong..."replied Quet"Some of the dinobots are 
inside the ark and I and Scourge have the key"he typed some 
buttons "But now... I just have it "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> GrimLock looked down. "I... Was King of the Dino-Bots... Prime 
asked me to be 
> a guardian, and with me my fellows, but the traitor Scourge 
attacked us, he 
> nearly destroyed the others... He Killed Mirage..., and he placed 
me in a 
> position where if my young friend here had not rebuilt me in this 
new form I would 
> have faced a system crash... Scourge had my mind upgraded... and 
now not only 
> do I know I failed, but he has taken Slag, Sludge, swoop, and 
snarl."
